name: The Eclipse Desk
description: This unique writing desk breathes an air of cool sophistication into a smart study. With its clean, elegant lines and streamlined profile, the Eclipse has the potential to transform an office space. The desk features detailing in nickel or brass, complementing your chosen finish to create a contemporary mood suitable for both traditional and modern interiors. From the front, it has a smart curve to the tabletop and pedestal, referencing 1930s Art Deco style. The back features a bank of drawers for ample storage, best showcased in the centre of a room. Noteworthy is the levitated tabletop, enhancing the space with lightness, complemented by the subtle recessed base that adds to the illusion of weightlessness.
